verses.verse: And the <S%H1697>word<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H1961>came<s%> to me <S%H559>saying,<s%>

<S%H1121>"Son<s%> of <S%H120>man,<s%> <S%H7760>set<s%> your <S%H6440>face<s%> <S%H413>toward<s%> <S%H1463>Gog<s%> of the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4031>Magog,<s%> the <S%H5387>prince<s%> of <S%H7220>Rosh,<s%> <S%H4902>Meshech,<s%> and <S%H8422>Tubal,<s%> and <S%H5012>prophesy<s%> <S%H5921>against<s%> him,

and <S%H559>say,<s%> <S%H3541>'Thus<s%> <S%H559>says<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3068>God,<s%> <S%H2009>"Behold,<s%> I am <S%H413>against<s%> you, O <S%H1463>Gog,<s%> <S%H5387>prince<s%> of <S%H7220>Rosh,<s%> <S%H4902>Meshech,<s%> and <S%H8422>Tubal.<s%>

"And I will <S%H7725>turn<s%> you <S%H7725>about,<s%> and <S%H5414>put<s%> <S%H2397>hooks<s%> into your <S%H3895>jaws,<s%> and I will <S%H3318>bring<s%> you out, and <S%H3605>all<s%> your <S%H2428>army,<s%> <S%H5483>horses<s%> and <S%H6571>horsemen,<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> of them <S%H4358>splendidly<s%> <S%H3847>attired,<s%> a <S%H7227>great<s%> <S%H6951>company<s%> [with] <S%H6793>buckler<s%> and <S%H4043>shield,<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> of them <S%H8610>wielding<s%> <S%H2719>swords;<s%>
<S%H6539>Persia,<s%> <S%H3568>Ethiopia,<s%> and <S%H6316>Put<s%> with them, <S%H3605>all<s%> of them [with] <S%H4043>shield<s%> and <S%H3553>helmet;<s%>

<S%H1586>Gomer<s%> with <S%H3605>all<s%> its <S%H102>troops;<s%> Beth-togarmah [from] the <S%H3411>remote<s%> <S%H3411>parts<s%> of the <S%H6828>north<s%> with <S%H3605>all<s%> its <S%H102>troops<s%> â€“ <S%H7227>many<s%> <S%H5971>peoples<s%> with you.

"Be <S%H3559>prepared,<s%> and <S%H3559>prepare<s%> yourself, you and <S%H3605>all<s%> your <S%H6951>companies<s%> that are <S%H6950>assembled<s%> <S%H5921>about<s%> you, and be a <S%H4929>guard<s%> for them.

<S%H4480>"After<s%> <S%H7227>many<s%> <S%H3117>days<s%> you will be <S%H6485>summoned;<s%> in the <S%H319>latter<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> you will <S%H935>come<s%> into the <S%H776>land<s%> that is <S%H7725>restored<s%> from the <S%H2719>sword,<s%> [whose inhabitants] have been <S%H6908>gathered<s%> from <S%H7227>many<s%> <S%H5971>nations<s%> to the <S%H2022>mountains<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> had <S%H1961>been<s%> a <S%H8548>continual<s%> <S%H2723>waste;<s%> but its people were <S%H3318>brought<s%> out from the <S%H5971>nations,<s%> and they are <S%H3427>living<s%> <S%H983>securely,<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> of them.

"And you will <S%H5927>go<s%> up, you will <S%H935>come<s%> like a <S%H9585>storm;<s%> you will be like a <S%H6051>cloud<s%> <S%H3680>covering<s%> the <S%H776>land,<s%> you and <S%H3605>all<s%> your <S%H102>troops,<s%> and <S%H7227>many<s%> <S%H5971>peoples<s%> with you."

<S%H3541>'Thus<s%> <S%H559>says<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3068>God,<s%> "It will <S%H1961>come<s%> about on that <S%H3117>day,<s%> that <S%H1697>thoughts<s%> will <S%H5927>come<s%> into your <S%H3824>mind,<s%> and you will <S%H2803>devise<s%> an <S%H7451>evil<s%> <S%H4284>plan,<s%>

and you will <S%H559>say,<s%> 'I will <S%H5927>go<s%> up <S%H5921>against<s%> the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H6519>unwalled<s%> <S%H6519>villages.<s%> I will <S%H935>go<s%> against those who are at <S%H8252>rest,<s%> that <S%H3427>live<s%> <S%H983>securely,<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> of them <S%H3427>living<s%> <S%H369>without<s%> <S%H2346>walls,<s%> and <S%H369>having<s%> <S%H369>no<s%> <S%H1280>bars<s%> or <S%H1817>gates,<s%>

to <S%H7997>capture<s%> <S%H7998>spoil<s%> and to <S%H962>seize<s%> <S%H957>plunder,<s%> to <S%H7725>turn<s%> your <S%H3027>hand<s%> <S%H5921>against<s%> the <S%H2723>waste<s%> <S%H2723>places<s%> which are [now] <S%H3427>inhabited,<s%> and <S%H413>against<s%> the <S%H5971>people<s%> who are <S%H622>gathered<s%> from the <S%H1471>nations,<s%> who have <S%H6213>acquired<s%> <S%H4735>cattle<s%> and <S%H7075>goods,<s%> who <S%H3427>live<s%> at the <S%H2872>center<s%> of the <S%H776>world.<s%>'

<S%H7614>"Sheba,<s%> and <S%H1719>Dedan,<s%> and the <S%H5503>merchants<s%> of <S%H8659>Tarshish,<s%> with <S%H3605>all<s%> its <S%H9219>villages,<s%> will <S%H559>say<s%> to you, 'Have you <S%H935>come<s%> to <S%H7997>capture<s%> <S%H7998>spoil<s%>? Have you <S%H6950>assembled<s%> your <S%H6951>company<s%> to <S%H962>seize<s%> <S%H957>plunder,<s%> to <S%H5375>carry<s%> away <S%H3701>silver<s%> and <S%H2091>gold,<s%> to <S%H3947>take<s%> away <S%H4735>cattle<s%> and <S%H7075>goods,<s%> to <S%H7997>capture<s%> <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H7998>spoil<s%>?'"'

<S%H3651>"Therefore,<s%> <S%H5012>prophesy,<s%> <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H120>man,<s%> and <S%H559>say<s%> to <S%H1463>Gog,<s%> <S%H3541>'Thus<s%> <S%H559>says<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3068>God,<s%> "On that <S%H3117>day<s%> when My <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H3478>Israel<s%> are <S%H3427>living<s%> <S%H983>securely,<s%> will you not <S%H3045>know<s%> [it]?

"And you will <S%H935>come<s%> from your <S%H4725>place<s%> out of the <S%H3411>remote<s%> <S%H3411>parts<s%> of the <S%H6828>north,<s%> you and <S%H7227>many<s%> <S%H5971>peoples<s%> with you, <S%H3605>all<s%> of them <S%H7392>riding<s%> on <S%H5483>horses,<s%> a <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H6951>assembly<s%> and a <S%H7227>mighty<s%> <S%H2428>army;<s%>

and you will <S%H5927>come<s%> up <S%H5921>against<s%> My <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H3478>Israel<s%> like a <S%H6051>cloud<s%> to <S%H3680>cover<s%> the <S%H776>land.<s%> It will <S%H1961>come<s%> about in the <S%H319>last<s%> <S%H3117>days<s%> that I shall <S%H935>bring<s%> you <S%H5921>against<s%> My <S%H776>land,<s%> in <S%H4616>order<s%> that the <S%H1471>nations<s%> may <S%H3045>know<s%> Me when I shall be <S%H6942>sanctified<s%> through you before their <S%H5869>eyes,<s%> O <S%H1463>Gog.<s%> "

<S%H3541>'Thus<s%> <S%H559>says<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3068>God,<s%> "Are you the <S%H1931>one<s%> of <S%H834>whom<s%> I <S%H1696>spoke<s%> in <S%H6931>former<s%> <S%H3117>days<s%> <S%H3027>through<s%> My <S%H5650>servants<s%> the <S%H5030>prophets<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> who <S%H5012>prophesied<s%> in <S%H1992>those<s%> <S%H3117>days<s%> for [many] <S%H8141>years<s%> that I would <S%H935>bring<s%> you <S%H5921>against<s%> them?

"And it will <S%H1961>come<s%> about on that <S%H3117>day,<s%> <S%H3117>when<s%> <S%H1463>Gog<s%> <S%H935>comes<s%> <S%H5921>against<s%> the <S%H127>land<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%>" <S%H5002>declares<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3068>God,<s%> "that My <S%H2534>fury<s%> will <S%H5927>mount<s%> up in My <S%H639>anger.<s%>

"And in My <S%H7068>zeal<s%> and in My <S%H784>blazing<s%> <S%H5678>wrath<s%> I <S%H1696>declare<s%> [that] on that <S%H3117>day<s%> there will <S%H518>surely<s%> <S%H3808><s%> be a <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H7494>earthquake<s%> in the <S%H127>land<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>

"And the <S%H1709>fish<s%> of the <S%H3220>sea,<s%> the <S%H5775>birds<s%> of the <S%H8064>heavens,<s%> the <S%H9130>beasts<s%> of the <S%H7704>field,<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H7431>creeping<s%> <S%H7431>things<s%> that <S%H7430>creep<s%> on the <S%H127>earth,<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H120>men<s%> <S%H834>who<s%> are on the <S%H6440>face<s%> of the <S%H127>earth<s%> will <S%H7493>shake<s%> at My <S%H6440>presence;<s%> the <S%H2022>mountains<s%> also will be <S%H2040>thrown<s%> <S%H2040>down,<s%> the <S%H4095>steep<s%> <S%H4095>pathways<s%> will <S%H5307>collapse,<s%> and <S%H3605>every<s%> <S%H2346>wall<s%> will <S%H5307>fall<s%> to the <S%H776>ground.<s%>

"And I shall <S%H7121>call<s%> for a <S%H2719>sword<s%> <S%H5921>against<s%> him on <S%H3605>all<s%> My <S%H2022>mountains,<s%>" <S%H5002>declares<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3068>God.<s%> <S%H376>"Every<s%> man's <S%H2719>sword<s%> will be against his <S%H251>brother.<s%>

"And with <S%H1698>pestilence<s%> and with <S%H1818>blood<s%> I shall <S%H8199>enter<s%> into <S%H8199>judgment<s%> with him; and I shall <S%H4305>rain<s%> on him, and on his <S%H102>troops,<s%> and on the <S%H7227>many<s%> <S%H5971>peoples<s%> <S%H834>who<s%> are with him, a <S%H7857>torrential<s%> <S%H1653>rain,<s%> with <S%H417>hailstones,<s%> <S%H68><s%> <S%H784>fire,<s%> and <S%H1614>brimstone.<s%>

"And I shall <S%H1431>magnify<s%> Myself, <S%H6942>sanctify<s%> Myself, and <S%H3045>make<s%> Myself <S%H3045>known<s%> in the <S%H5869>sight<s%> of <S%H7227>many<s%> <S%H1471>nations;<s%> and they will <S%H3045>know<s%> that I am the <S%H3068>Lord.<s%>"'
